      • createBar

        public abstract Bar createBar​(java.lang.String title,
                              net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.BossBattle.BarColor color,
                              net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.BossBattle.BarStyle style,
                              org.bukkit.boss.BarFlag... flags)
        Create a boss bossbar with the supplied parameters
        Parameters:
        title - bossbar's title (or translation key if used)
        color - bossbar's color
        style - bossbar's style
        flags - bossbar's flags
        Returns:
        a bukkit wrapped boss bossbar

      • createBar

        public abstract Bar createBar​(java.lang.String title,
                              net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.BossBattle.BarColor color,
                              net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.BossBattle.BarStyle style,
                              java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Object[]> parameters,
                              org.bukkit.boss.BarFlag... flags)
        Create a boss bossbar with the supplied parameters and title parameters
        Parameters:
        title - title translation key
        color - bossbar's color
        style - bossbar's style
        parameters - some translation parameters
        flags - bossbar's flags
        Returns:
        a bukkit wrapped boss bossbar

      • createSequence

        public abstract BarSequence createSequence​(BarProperties properties,
                                           Bar... bars)
        Create a bossbar sequence to display multiples bars in a specific order
        Parameters:
        properties - bossbar properties, it will be set to each bossbar, except if supplied bars already have some properties set
        bars - minimum 1 bossbar to init sequence
        Returns:
        an util class to manage this sequence
